annotations.title: The 6 Most Iconic Cocktails

textContent:
1 Egg
.5oz sugar cane syrup
.75oz Heavy Cream
2oz Brandy

Shake dry then shake with ice. Pour into toddy glass and garnish with grated nutmeg. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cvQzoQ-L08g
title: Brandy Flip
